title: Sausage & Baked Bean Casserole
ingredients: A pack of your favourite sausages (6, 8, or 12)
1 tsp garlic puree (or 1 fresh, crushed clove)
instructions: Cut the pepper and onion into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat.
Add sausages and cook until one side is browned.
Add onions, stir, and turn sausages to brown the other sides.
Cook until sausages are browned and onions are translucent.
Add chopped pepper, garlic, tomato puree, paprika, thyme, and sugar. Stir and cook for 1 minute.
Add Worcestershire sauce, baked beans, and chopped tomatoes.
Cover with a lid and simmer on low heat for 5–10 minutes until thickened and hot throughout.
Serve with mashed potatoes and buttered bread.
notes: Use any sausages you like—6 or 8 work well.
Peppers are optional if your family doesn’t like them.
